III provided the following information: 
On 12/05/1993, III helped a man on. Wilshire Blvd, in Beverly Hills, CA 
who had a flat tire. The man introduced himself as Jeffrey Epstein. 
Epstein offered to take III to his ranch in New Mexico that day and -
agreed. III was taken to a private airport and flown to an air strip a 
couple of miles from Epstein's ranch. 
III was taken downstairs to the "strippers lounge." On his third Pepsi, 
III become unconscious. III woke to being 
He saw three young boys also strapped down next to him. -
believed the boys were about 17 years old. III and the boys had their 
III stated 
that he drifted in and out of consciousness during the incident.

While he was awake, III was able to see a 
deformed penis. As Epstein held 
him down with his right hand, Epstein left hand reach across him. III saw

Epstein's left arm. III woke up 
on the couch to two armed guards inside the 
room. He indicated that his 
clothing was 
wet, like he was put in the shower. He requested to return 
to California. The armed guards came with them on the return trip and 
III did not tell anyone about the incident. 
III is attempting to hire a lawyer to file a civil suit against Epstein's 
estate. III did not remember the attorney's name; 
however, the 
attorney's telephone 
number is and in 
the Los Angeles area.
